physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Originally acyanotic from 2010 to 2016, the patient gradually became cyanotic after the hemoptysis episode in 2016.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe cough and hemoptysis, approximately 50 ml in volume.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Progression from WHO-FC I to IV occurred, indicating worsening of condition.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Cyanosis was observed after the hemoptysis episode.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Gradual improvement in symptoms post hemoptysis, associated with a decrease in pulmonary artery pressure and left ventricular enlargement.
